body_html:
I think your gcc is too old - Slackware 14.0 ships gcc 4.7.1, but the error messages suggests that a C++11 feature called "Inheriting Constructors" is being used by tensorflow, which requires at least gcc 4.8.

Can you upgrade to Slackware 14.1? That has gcc 4.8.2, which should be fine.

Can you upgrade to Slackware 14.1? That has gcc 4.8.2, which should be fine.
body:
I think your gcc is too old - Slackware 14.0 ships gcc 4.7.1, but the error messages suggests that a C++11 feature called "Inheriting Constructors" is being used by tensorflow, which requires at least gcc 4.8.

Can you upgrade to Slackware 14.1? That has gcc 4.8.2, which should be fine.
